data.text: Hoohoo gi di hale di king go Ahab i Jezreel la iai di hadagee waini ni taane dono ingoo go Naboth.

Di laangi e dahi, gei Ahab ga helekai gi Naboth, “Dugua mai gi di au gi hai mee gi dau hadagee. Ma dela e hoohoo gi dogu hale, gei au e hiihai e hai hegau gi di gowaa deelaa e hai dagu hadagee meegai laagau. Au ga gowadu gi di goe di hadagee waini dela koia e mada humalia, be maa goe e hiihai, gei au ga hui adu di maa i di hui dela e dohu.”
Naboth ga helekai, “Di hadagee waini deenei la ne gai ei au mo ogu damana mmaadua. Dimaadua e bule bolo au gi hudee dugu adu gi di goe e hai mee gi di maa.”
Ahab gaa hana gi dono hale, guu lodo daamaha, gei gu hagawelewele gi di kai a Naboth dela ne hai ang gi deia. Mee gaa moe i hongo dono moenge, e huli gi di abaaba di hale, gu hagalee hiihai e miami.
Dono lodo go Jezebel gaa hana gi mee ga heeu, “Goe e aha dela e lodo daamaha huoloo? Goe e aha dela e hagalee hiihai e miami?”

Gei mee ga helekai, “Idimaa go telekai a Naboth dela ne hai mai gi di au. Au ne hai bolo e hui dana hadagee waini, be mee e hiihai, gei au gaa wanga gi mee di hadagee waini labelaa e pono di lohongo di maa, gei mee ga hai mai bolo au e deemee di hai mee gi di maa.”
Jezebel ga helekai, “Ma goe di king be hagalee di king? Duu gi nua gi daha mo do moenge, tenetene gei gi miami, gei au ga gowadu laa di hadagee a Naboth gi di goe!”
Jezebel gaa hihi ana lede, gaa wanga ginai di ingoo Ahab, ga taini nia maa gi di maaga o Ahab, gaa kae nia maa gi digau aamua mo nia dagi o Jezreel.
Nia lede le e helekai boloo, “Haga iloo ina di laangi e noho hagaonge, gahia mai nia daangada gi di gowaa e dahi, gei haga noho ina a Naboth i di lohongo aamua.

Halahala ina nia daangada dogolua hai kai tilikai, haga noho ina meemaa i baahi adu gi golo teebele a Naboth, e hai nau hagi aga kai tilikai gi Naboth bolo mee la gu hagahuaidu a God mo di king. Ga nomuli gaa lahi a mee gi tua di waahale ga dilidili a mee gii made.”
Digau aamua mo nia dagi o Jezreel la guu hai gii hai be nnelekai a Jezebel ala ne hai.
Digaula gu haga noho di laangi hagaonge, gu gahi mai nia daangada gi di gowaa e dahi, guu dugu a Naboth i di gowaa aamua.

Nia daangada hai kai tilikai dogolua guu noho i baahi adu gi golo teebele ga helekai hai baahi gi Naboth i mua digau dogologo, bolo mee ne hagahuaidu a God mo di king, gei Naboth la guu lahi gi tua di waahale, gu dilidili gii made.
Di haga iloo dela bolo Naboth la gu daaligi gii made, guu kae gi Jezebel.
Di madagoaa telekai deenei ne dau i Jezebel, gei mee ga helekai gi Ahab, “Naboth la guu made. Hana dolomeenei, hai mee gi di hadagee dela ne dumaanga iei mee di hui adu gi di goe.”
Di madagoaa hua deelaa, gei Ahab guu hana gu hai mee gi di hadagee deelaa.
Gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi Elijah, soukohp mai Tishbe, boloo,
“Hana gi di king Ahab o Samaria. Goe ga gidee a mee i lodo di hadagee waini a Naboth, dela bolo ia ga hai mee gi di maa.
Helekai gi mee boloo, ‘Au go Dimaadua e helekai adu gi di goe bolo i muli do daaligi taane deelaa gii made, e hai behee, goe ga hai mee labelaa gi di gowaa a maa?’
Di madagoaa Ahab ne mmada gi Elijah, geia ga helekai, “Dogu hagadaumee, goe gu gidee au?”

Deelaa laa, Dimaadua e helekai adu, ‘Au ga gowadu gi di goe di haingadaa damanaiee. Au ga hagalee hila adu gi di goe, gei Au gaa hai goe gi hagalee. Au ga hagammaa gi daha nia dama daane huogodoo o do hagadili, digau lligi mo digau mmaadua.

Do hagadili la gaa hai be di hagadili ni king Jeroboam, go tama daane a Nebat, gei gaa hai labelaa be di hagadili ni king Baasha, tama daane a Ahijah, idimaa, goe guu hai Au gi hagawelewele mai i doo dagi a Israel gi lodo di hala.’
“Gei ogo Dimaadua e haga iloo i di hai o Jezebel, bolo nia paana gaa gai tuaidina o maa i lodo di waahale go Jezreel.21.23 2 Kings 9.36
Di ingoo hua tangada i digau Ahab ala ma gaa mmade i lodo di waahale, le e gai go nia paana, gei tei ginaadou ala ma gaa mmade i lodo nia gowaa ala i daha, le e gai go nia manu mamaangi ‘vulture’.”

(Deai tangada i golo ne hai ana mee huaidu be Ahab ai, dela ne dugu anga ia hagatau bolo e hai nia mee huaidu i mua nnadumada o Dimaadua, ala go nia mee huogodoo ne hagamaamaa ge ne hagamaaloo aga go dono lodo go Jezebel.

Mee ne hai nia huaidu ala e kaedahi e haga langaadia dangada i ana hai daumaha ang gi nia balu ada mee bolo ma nia god, be di hai o digau Amor ala ne hagabagi go Dimaadua gi daha mo nadau guongo, i mua digau Israel.)

Di madagoaa Elijah ne lawa dono helekai, Ahab ga hahaahi ono gahu, gaa daa nia maa gi daha, ga ulu gi lodo nia gahu lodo huaidu. Mee gu hagalee hiihai gi nia meegai, e kii hua i lodo nia gahu lodo huaidu, e heehee mo dono manawa gee ge lodo huaidu.
Dimaadua ga helekai gi soukohp Elijah,

“Goe gu gidee di hai a Ahab dela gu manawa hila gi lala i ogu mua? Mee dela guu hai beenei, malaa, Au ga hagalee wanga di haingadaa gi mee i lodo dono madagoaa e mouli ai, ma go di madagoaa di mouli o dana dama daane dela ga gaamai di haingadaa gi di hagadili o Ahab.”
